General.Name: Walsin Technology Corp
General.Description: Walsin Technology Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells of passive electronic components in Taiwan and internationally. It provides chip capacitors, chip resistors, semiconductive capacitor elements, ceramic dielectric powders, and magnetic elements. It also researches, develops, manufactures, and sells integrated electrical protection component, hybrid microwave antenna module, electric capacitors, thick film printed circuit board, multilayered dielectric filters, EMI filters, and multilayer type microwave communication component and module; sensing control and radio frequency components; and trades electronic parts. Additionally, it offers transformer, coils, and rectifier diode; computers and peripheral output devices, communication products and components, antenna wholesale, and after sales service. Further, It provides marketing, warehousing, and commission agency services. The company's products are used in mobile communication, networking, automotive, industrial, power supply, IoT, green energy, PC and peripheral, and lighting applications. Walsin Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
